page.title: 04Ben Butcher's Day
page.content:
{Written by Ben Butcher (age 11)}
I get up about 8 o'clock and get dressed. When I've had my breakfast I check that I've got everything in my school bag and then watch TVAM. At a quarter to 9 I leave for school. In the morning we do Maths and Language and then we have dinner. After that we go in and work. When I get home I have a cup of tea with Mum. The I go out and do the animals at Stidston (a 7 acre field with 2 barns that we keep lots of animals in). After we've done that we fill the water buckets. Then we go home and have tea and I watch tele until bed time. Then I get into bed and read until I can't keep my eyes open any more.
